overview.title: GLM API Documentation
overview.description: Welcome to the GLM (Zhipu AI) API proxy service. This documentation provides detailed instructions for all available API endpoints, including request parameters, response formats, and code examples.

baseUrl.title: Base URL

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: All API requests require a valid Bearer Token in the request header:
auth.warning: Please keep your API key secure and do not expose it in client-side code.
